requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / GT, ATI Raedon HD 2600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 3.00 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / GT, ATI Raedon HD 2600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card with latest drivers
